name: Megamind: The Video Game - Mega Team Unite
name_original: Megamind: The Video Game - Mega Team Unite
description:
Megamind: The Video Game - Mega Team Unite is an arcade game developed by THQ Australia. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by THQ. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Megamind: The Video Game - Mega Team Unite is available on Wii.
